About me

Bio

I'm a trained psychologist with an experience of more than 4 years and have worked with both children and adults.

My training and experience has enabled me to deal with issues like:

  • Anxiety
  • Depression
  • Work stress
  • Work-life imbalance
  • Developmental disorders
  • Parenting

Qualifications

  1. B.A. (Honours) Psychology - University of Delhi
  2. M.A. in Applied Psychology with specialization in Clinical Psychology - (TISS-BALM)
